attributes.action: Introduce stronger penalties on those drivers that continue to defy the law, and drive without insurance, tax and a valid MOT certificate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are sick of all the drivers that practically get away with not having the minimum insurance required to drive a motor vehicle on our roads. Time and time again these idiotic drivers are caught and fined substantially less than the cost of actually insuring a vehicle. It is about time that these drivers are given much harsher penalties than a small fine and  court costs. 

We think that with every offence the drivers caught should be banned from driving for at least 12 months and fined a substantial amount of money to compensate all the victims who are hit by uninsured drivers. 

Also that a larger emphasis is put on finding and convicting drivers without insurance, instead of concentrating on speeding motorists, such as regular checks of the insurance status of a vehicle, like the road tax cameras that are already in service.
